channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Cloud Edge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Cloud Edge

item.title: CVE-2024-48904|2024-10-22T19:00:48.004Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20cloud%20edge
item.description:
An command injection vulnerability in Trend Micro Cloud Edge could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on affected appliances.
Please note: authentication is not required in order to exploit this vulnerability.
